name: .BSB File Extension
summary: Learn about .BSB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Save game file created by BioShock, a first-person shooter game where players battle against biologically modified beings; contains a saved state during gameplay; used to save and load in-game progress.

content: BSB files may have the name Autosave.bsb for a saved state that is automatically created during gameplay.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
